solution_line_template: Jess’ second stack was {first_stack} blocks + {second_higher_than_first} blocks = <<{first_stack}+{second_higher_than_first}={second_stack}>>{second_stack} blocks.
Jess’ third stack was {second_stack} blocks + {third_higher_than_second} blocks = <<{second_stack}+{third_higher_than_second}={third_stack}>>{third_stack} blocks high.
Jess’ sister knocked down the second tower and knocked {second_stack} blocks – {second_left_standing} = <<{second_stack}-{second_left_standing}={second_knocked}>>{second_knocked} blocks knocked over.
Jess’ sister knocked down the final tower and knocked {third_stack} blocks – {third_left_standing} = <<{third_stack}-{third_left_standing}={third_knocked}>>{third_knocked} blocks knocked over.
Total blocks knocked over was {first_stack} blocks + {second_knocked} + {third_knocked} = <<{first_stack}+{second_knocked}+{third_knocked}={total_knocked}>>{total_knocked} blocks.
